Container.Name: Retrom
Container.Overview: Retrom is a centralized game library management service that allows you to host your games on a single device, and connect clients on any amount of other devices to (un)install/download and subsequently launch said games locally.
Container.Category: MediaApp:Other MediaServer:Other Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.Requires: This application expects a `config.json` file to be present in the "Config Data" directory. See documentation: https://github.com/JMBeresford/retrom/blob/main/README.md#docker-recommended [br] This application requires a separate Postgres database. Configuration data for the Postgres container (host, username, password, database name) should be updated in the `config.json` file.

Config.Name: Service Port
